sentence.Network_en: "That's the first part finished," he said proudly.
sentence.Network_cn: “那是已完成的第一部分，”他自豪地说。
她得意地展示所获的奖品。

sentence.Network_en: She gazed proudly at the shiny buckles on her shoes.
sentence.Network_cn: 她骄傲地注视着鞋上闪亮的扣环.

list.abs: you proudly stand up and know that even though you are tired , even though you feel exhausted sometimes , and even though you feel like you are dragging this body around .你骄傲地站起来而且知道，即使你很疲累，即使你有时感觉精疲力竭，而且即使你感觉你好像是正在四处扯拽这一个身体。

entry.def: If you feel proud, you feel pleased about something good that you possess or have done, or about something good that a person close to you has done.

example.ex: I felt proud of his efforts...
example.tran: 我为他的努力感到骄傲。

example.ex: They are proud that she is doing well at school...
example.tran: 他们为她出色的学习成绩感到骄傲。

entry.tran: 最值得夸耀的；最引以为荣的
entry.def: Your proudest moments or achievements are the ones that you are most proud of.

example.ex: This must have been one of the proudest moments of his busy and hard working life.
example.tran: 这一定是他劳碌工作的一生中最引以为荣的时刻之一。

entry.def: Someone who is proud has respect for themselves and does not want to lose the respect that other people have for them.

example.ex: He was too proud to ask his family for help and support...
example.tran: 他自尊心太强，不愿向家人寻求帮助和支持。

example.ex: We are a proud people. We are not used to begging or taking things.
example.tran: 我们是有自尊的民族。我们不习惯乞讨或接受施舍。

entry.tran: 骄傲的；傲慢的；妄自尊大的
entry.def: Someone who is proud feels that they are better or more important than other people.

example.ex: She was said to be proud and arrogant.

entry.def: If one object stands proud of another object that it is attached to or next to, it extends beyond it.

example.ex: The handles stand proud of the doors of the car.

entry.tran: 盛情款待；给…以隆重待遇
entry.def: If someone does you proud, they treat you very well, for example by welcoming you and giving you good food and entertainment.

example.ex: The hotel has indeed done them proud.
example.tran: 这家宾馆的确对他们盛情款待。

auth_sentence.content: Here's a Norwegian forest cat proudly on display.
auth_sentence.res_content: Here's a Norwegian forest cat proudly on display.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Here's a Norwegian forest cat proudly on display.

auth_sentence.content: I have spent my life proudly as an engineer.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have spent my life proudly as an engineer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have spent my life proudly as an engineer.

auth_sentence.content: They have worn proudly the uniform of our country.
auth_sentence.res_content: They have worn proudly the uniform of our country.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They have worn proudly the uniform of our country.

means.word_mean: 自豪地；高兴地；感到光荣地

sentences.en: He was grinning proudly,delighted with his achievements.
sentences.cn: 他为自己的成就感到喜悦,自豪地咧着嘴笑。

sentences.en: She proudly displayed her degree certificate to her parents.
sentences.cn: 她自豪地向父母展示了学位证书。

means.word_mean: 得意扬扬地；骄傲地；夸耀地

sentences.en: She proudly displayed her collection of ornaments.
sentences.cn: 她得意扬扬地摆列出她的饰品集。

sentences.en: She gazed proudly at the shiny buckles on her shoes.
sentences.cn: 她骄傲地注视着鞋上闪亮的扣环。

sentences.en: The company proudly announced the launch of its new range of cars.
sentences.cn: 该公司骄傲地宣布其新一系列的轿车已投放市场。

sentences.en: The young woman proudly displayed her furs.
sentences.cn: 那个年轻女人骄傲地炫耀她的皮衣。

sentences.en: He proudly refused help from anyone.
sentences.cn: 他傲慢地拒绝了任何人的帮助。

sentences.en: When I asked him if he could do so,he replied proudly,“What else?”
sentences.cn: 我问他是否做得到,他傲然地回答:“那还用问吗?”
